Forms¶

Forms for the MWC Gallery app.

class gallery.forms.GalleryDetailsForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form for users to provide details for a gallery.models.Gallery. Also provides a forms.FileField so that users can upload a zip archive of photos to attach to the gallery.

Updates the labels for the name and description fields.

class gallery.forms.GalleryUpdateForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.util.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=':', empty_permitted=False)¶

Simple, one-field form for allowing a user to upload a zip file to be attached to a gallery.

class gallery.forms.MediaForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.util.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=':', empty_permitted=False, instance=None)¶

Subclass of mediaman.forms.MediaModelForm that makes the following changes:

  • Exclude the creator and created classes.
  • Add an optional delete field.

This is used in the gallery.views.gallery_edit_details() as a formset, allowing the user to edit galleries in bulk.

Cover Images

This class does not provide a field for selecting a gallery’s cover image. This is because that field is unique in the formset, not an individual form. Instead this field is included as an radio button in the gallery/templates/gallery/_media_form.html template.
